name: The bench of him
description:
Me before quarantine.

When I was nine years old, Sadegh Hedayat's books were not appropriate for a girl in my age. But my Mom used to have them in her library, and  I secretly read them at night. So as a teenager, I got familiar with Sadegh Hedayat and his ideology. For me, he was intellectual, intelligent, and I was excited to read each single of his books. There were many stories and myths about him when he was living in Paris, and one of them says that he often sat on a bench in one of the parks of Paris and took notes for his books. So, when I traveled to Paris several years ago, I looked for that Park, found that bench, and sat on The bench in his legacy.
